name: Chromonexus
description:
A puzzle game made for the Lost Relic Games - Game Jam.

Can you solve the puzzles?

Bubbles must match their predecessors, but your choices are limited, so watch ahead!

How to play: Click on one of the five bubbles in the bottom row to place it.

Objective: All connections in the level must have matching bubbles

Code written in Rust using Macroquad.

The font Venryn Sans is licensed under the OFL (SIL Open Font License).

Sound effects from kenney.nl are licensed under the CC0 1.0 Universal license.
